titleStmt.title: The representations of his Majesties adherents of the court and countrey, their interest with the King, and the Scots with them. / Published for satisfaction of the honest well-meaning people of the kingdom. A. Borialis.
titleStmt.author: Borialis, A.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 11th 1647"; the "8" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
